ing: 1 (8 ounce) package shredded sharp Cheddar cheese
1 (.7 ounce) package dry Italian-style salad dressing mix
des: "Just a cheese ball. Try it. Everyone here likes it."
ins:
In a large bowl combine cream cheese, Cheddar cheese, pickle juice and salad dressing mix.  Blend well, mixing by hand.
Shape into a ball and roll in pecans.  Refrigerate at least 3 hours before serving.
